short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply and easily removes any promoted element on Twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to remove the promoted content originally displayed on the web version of Twitter (twitter.com).

This cannot post Tweets nor access your personal data, its only purpose is to hide advertising.
